Key: *sigh*... Whew. Are we close to the end?

Yes. It is going well. I wonder if everyone
else is safe.

Don't worry. They'll absolutely pull through.
...Do you know where Marina is?
Yes. We are almost there.
If we connect the coordinates... We are here!

You're late, Shido Itsuka. And Maria, my
copy...
Marina...! Maria is no copy!

No matter what you say, it doesn't not
change the fact that she is a copy.

I don't care! Maria is Maria! And Marina is
Marina! Both of you exist here! It's not a
matter of who's real or fake!

It is true that both she and I have a will, and there
is no mistaking our lives are separate.
You are right there, Shido Itsuka.
Marina... You understand?

I suppose. I can acknowledge it, if you mean
in objective terms.
You will... acknowledge me?
That's right. Here, let's make up.
Are you... serious?

I'm serious. I'll stop this. If Maria...
acknowledges me.
Then... Then I will...
Wait. Don't get too close, Maria!
Yes, Shido Itsuka. Don't move.
Rgh...
Then, here. Let's shake.
Yes...
...?! Don't! MARIAAAAAAAA!!
It's too late. You're useless, Shido Itsuka.
Kyaaaaaaah!
Maria...? Hey, Maria!

Ah... Ahahahaha! You're SUCH an idiot! How
was it not obvious what would happen? Are
you that dense? Another one bites the dust.
Ma...ri...na...
What did you do to Maria?!

I absorbed her remaining authority. This was
the only way to usurp the connection. With this,
my Spirit power is limitless. My Astral Dress...!
This...
Hee hee... Hehaha... Hehe... Ahahahaha!!!!

(I gulped at her overwhelming presence.
I watched as time itself warped around her
awe-inspiring form.)

(She was greater, more terrifying, than
any Spirit I had ever faced. The only feeling
I could muster was overwhelming fear.)
D-Do not... Shido... Please, run...

There's no escape in this world. You'll
all disappear... Disappear! Hee hee. Aha...
Ahahahahah!

After all, you can't stop me anymore. Not
with all the power I've gained!
Marina, you...

So long as I exist in this realm, no one can
challenge me! It's over. All over. Too bad,
Shido Itsuka. Your brilliance ends here.
What do you plan to do with that power?!

Destroy. Destroy everything. After all, that
is all I can do. I cannot touch the real world.
You... can't touch it?

Yes. Didn't you know? After all, I am no
different from that girl. I have no body in
the real world. I'm just a clump of data.
You only exist in this world too...?

That's right. Hence why we made a connection.
Did I sympathize with you? Or did I want a
friend? Huh? Why? I don't know. I don't know!
This is bad...! Maria, get behind me!
Shido—!
Don't worry. Stay back, Maria.

I see. So that's your power... Resist as much
as you'd like. It holds no candle to me!

I know, but even so, I have to do this! I'm
the only who can stop you!

Ohh. I see. Efreet's regeneration powers.
You're resilient, Shido Itsuka.
This still hurts, you know!

Jumping in only to hurt yourself. You are
a special entity, one who can seal a Spirit and
use it yourself, Shido Itsuka. A contradiction.
I'm... a contradiction?

You say you fight for them, but you have
sealed the Spirits' powers away. You say it
is too dangerous. That you want them to live.
Yeah, that's right...

But to what end? The Spirits are forced to
sit and watch, as you use their powers to
the same effect as them.

For the one who says Spirits are unnecessary,
you're the one who uses their powers most.
Can't you see that?
Ngh... I... I... That's not...

Shido Itsuka, you are a hypocrite. That's why
you cannot deny my power. You could never
negotiate a say in the first place!

But, even so! Wanting to help someone who's
suffering in front of me, who's in pain...
Isn't that normal?!

Then, you should accept your fate. Begone
for my sake! I'm suffering too, aren't I?!
Shido!!
It's okay, Maria. I'll keep you safe.
Shido, but... Your wounds!

Next is Hermit's power. See, you call upon that
power once more. The power you supposedly
detest. Yet there it is, in your hands!

I have to! Right now, it's the only way to
protect the people most important to me!

That is why you are a contradiction... and a
hypocrite!

So what if I'm a hypocrite! I... I'll do whatever
it takes to protect the people I care about!
Anything! That's for me to decide!
Then... Then, come here and save me too!
Mari...na...?

But you cannot. You know nothing about my
past, my birth into loneliness. This is the path
laid before me. I'll destroy it all, turn it to ash!

(Listening to her speak, a thought came over
me.)

(It's possible that Marina was simply lonely...
That she was desperately searching for
fulfillment.)
Shi... Shin... Can you hear me?

...Reine-san? I can hear you. But the situation
is a real mess.
...I see. I have a report.

I'd be happy if it contains some way for us
to come back.

I think you've already realized, but the
majority of the Fraxinus' system has
been seized.

Is it because Marina stole the ship's
master control?

Yes. Sadly we have no time. We tried interfering
with the main cannon, but it was no use. All
that is left... is to do something about Marina.

Damn it. At this rate, who knows what'll
happen to the Fraxinus, and the world below.

Ahahaha... You don't even worry about your
own life. Not that it matters, since the end is
nigh for everyone.

...What? They have grown stronger all of a
sudden!
At this rate, we will be pushed back.
Rgh... Shido, please. We will not last long!
K-Kotori-san, all of a sudden, they...

Yeah. Their power is surging. We have to
keep going...
This doesn't look too good, does it?!

I don't want to hear your whining. All we
can do is believe in Shido.
I'll believe. I'm sure... Shido-san will do it.
You're right. Do your best, Onii-chan.

My, my. The copies who were once defeated
have risen back to action.

They're like zombies. It's creepy. In fact,
this is a spooky situation...
Don't panic. We can still manage them...

True, but we can't hold them back
forever, can we?

Yes, you're right. We can only hope Shido-san
is doing his best.

You're right. I'm sure darling is taking care
of business.

Yes... Then we'll have to match him on the
battlefield, won't we?
Yes! Here we go!

Observation. The enemy's power seems to
be rising dramatically.

Rgh... Looks like my Demon Eye spell has lost
its effect.

Doubt. Your Demon Eye spell only works for
predicting the future, does it not?
U-Um...

Proposal. Great danger is approaching.
We must unite our powers once more.

If that's what fate's compass decrees, we
would be amiss not to have a meeting of
wings.
Surprise. You seem calm, Kaguya.
...Yeah. Because Shido's here.

Agreement. I feel the same. Here they come.
Defend.

...Understood! Lord of my covenant, if it is
you, we will surely overcome this abyss...
Conquer them!

You know you're going to disappear, so there's
no need to delay the inevitable... Save yourself
the trouble!
I told you. I'm hardy!

Shido... Please, leave me. At this rate, you
will...

No, I'll handle it. Maria and Marina...
I want to save you both!
...! Don't joke around!
Ngh!
Shido!!
(Marina's blow wallops against me.)
(In that moment...)

(As if awakened by the strike, something
inside of me was ready to burst out. Like I
remembered something I had forgotten.)
Oh...

(I identified what the sensation was.
What happened here, beyond my date
with Maria.)

(We made so many memories, experienced
so many things. Maria Arusu was right by our
side, and tried her hardest to change.)

(And she did change. That's why... I don't
want it to end here...!)
Shido! Shido!! Are you okay, Shido?!
Y-Yeah...

If you were not defending, you would
have time to attack. If I become your
shield, then I could be of use—

...! Don't say something so stupid! Being
useful or not doesn't matter! That's not
why I'm protecting you!
Sh-Shido...?

Because I like you, Maria. Because you're
important to me. That's why I am compelled
to protect you!

You see, Maria. People shouldn't be judged
by their usefulness... Those aren't reasons
to cut someone off!

The words of a saint. Too bad the world is
filled with wicked people. Besides, that girl
is data. Why ever would you protect her?

Maria... is Maria. Do I need any other reason
other than that? Whether or not she is data
doesn't matter.

It... doesn't matter? You think a machine
can feel actual emotions?

The Maria Arusu I know is a regular girl, has
all sorts of interests, and she laughs, cries,
and experiences both happiness and sadness.
Shido, that is...

You know, don't you? You don't really know
her! Maria, day by day, has been growing! So,
you don't get it. Maria is a real girl!

Shido... Did you remember everything?
All of the contents that have been simulated
until now...
Yeah, I'm not sure why though...

Is it possible, because I have lost authority,
that the protection locking Shido's memories
has...?

I see. Well, it's nice of you to have remembered.
But what's the point in acknowledging it? Are
you going to try to say I'm the same?

That's right. Marina, you're the same as Maria.
You're not data. You're a normal girl!

You're wrong. In the end, I'm just a fake.
Not a human, not a Spirit. How could I be
a regular girl? What a laugh...
This is nothing to laugh at!

I know. I know you erased Tonomachi,
but I know a different side to you as well.
Like when you saved that grandma.
That's... There was motive behind it!

So it was on a whim? That's fine, too.
But one thing is certain!
Certain...?
That's right. You're changing too!

Back then, you swatted my hand away when
I tried to pat you, but you didn't seem to
dislike it either.

That's... just your assumption! In no world
did I like it! Stop it, Shido Itsuka. Do not
confuse me!

I won't stop! You can decide your own
future! It's too early to give up like that!
Stop... Stop stop stop!! Don't give me hope!

Most likely, you will not be able to block
this! Shido, run!!

No. I'm not going to run! If I do, then I'll be
a liar! I swear to you, Maria—and Marina—I'll
save you!

All I need is Father... The one who created
me, who gave me purpose. Everything is
from Father, so I... I—!!!

Ngh... This might be... too much. No... I'll
endure this! I'll protect Maria, even if it
kills me!

You cannot, Shido! Your existence is too
precious. If you were to die, Shido, then—

Everyone... No, I am wrong. I, myself, would
be overwhelmed by grief, despairing.
Please, give me the strength to protect Shido.

I... wish to protect Shido. I do not want to
lose him... for everyone, and for myself.
He is more important than anyone else.
What... is this power?!
What the...?!
It seems the world has not yet abandoned me.
Maria, that form...
Is that... an Astral Dress?

A part of the Fraxinus' control has been
transferred. Because of this, I could generate
a fake Astral Dress.
When was my control relinquished?!

I am unsure. I merely prayed. The world...
The Fraxinus responded to it.

This power was willed into a being. One that
is an embodiment of my emotions. The power to
protect Shido—he who is most important to me.

It would never bend in your favor! You're
destined to disappear, like any copy would!
I am the one who will defeat you, begone!

Shido, I'm right here. Interference initiated...
Transferring power, disrupting coordinates.
With this—!

No way... Why can't I reach?! The space...
No, are you interfering with the program
itself?!

Let us combine forces for one more powerful
attack. Marina is likely expecting it as well.
Got it. I'm counting on your support!

Leave it to me. I'll stop her! Coordinates
locked—
NOW!!
Got it! GOOOOOOO!!

Marina. Please give it a little more thought.
Could we never come to an understanding?
KYAAAAAAAAAAH!
It appears the collapse has been halted.
Yeah. Did it... work out?

I have intervened in the system process, and
stopped the main cannon from firing.
I see. Thank goodness...
Shin, can you hear me? Control of the Fraxinus\nis returning, and the Realizer has stabilized.
Looks like we did it in time.
...Yes, well done. It's quite an achievement.

No, there's still one thing to do. Where did
Marina go?
Shido, to the Mother Room! I have a bad feeling!
All right!
Marina!

Aaaa... Where did I go wrong? When did these
feelings arise? No... No no no no no!
Marina...?

I can... no longer return. I can't return to
either world, stuck in limbo...

Marina! Hey, what's wrong! Listen to me,
Marina—
I don't want this. Someone, please. Erase me.
...! What is this reaction?!
Is this—?!
Shido, the situation has become dangerous.
...Shin, I have bad news. There's a problem\nwith the Fraxinus' aerial system.
But you just said control had returned.
...That should have been the case. It seems\nshe had a contingency plan.
Set the output for the Basic Realizer to\nmax! Please recover!! What... Did you say\nthe system is locked?!
...While we were recalibrating, the main\nsystem locked up. We cannot recover the\ncontrols.

Please wait, Reine-san! At this rate, is it
possible...
Yes. The Fraxinus will descend upon Tengu\nCity. A heavy airship loaded with a Realizer in\na critical state. The outcome seems obvious.
Do you mean, it could damage the city?
...I'll be frank with you. If the Fraxinus were\nto fall in this state, it would wipe out all of\nTengu City.
What did you say?!
Rgh. Our altitude is falling! There's no\nresponse from the Control Realizer either!\nWe can't even access manual controls...
...At this rate, the Fraxinus will undoubtedly\nfall atop Tengu City.
No way. Then, what can we...
Shin, erase Marina. There is no other way.
Erase... That's...
Nothing can be done about the system lock with\nour controls. We have no methods of recourse.\nWe can only erase the authority holder.
...Rgh! Why?!
On our end, we'll do everything we can to\ndelay the descent. However, we can't hold on\nforever.
Shido, Marina is—!
What... is that weird black mass?

She is absorbing the data around here, but
her body cannot withstand all of it at once.
Soon she will deteriorate.
No... Are you serious?! Can she not hear us?
If we could drag her out of there, or...
Then, Sandalphon!
No way. Did it not work at all?

No, its power is insufficient. Her rate of
absorption is regenerating her as well.
Then, I just have to keep at it...!

It's no use. No matter how many times you
attempt, it is impossible! She is healing too
quickly!
Then what can we do?!

Rgh. We're just too far. It's ridiculous! How
can we get closer?!
If only I was... stronger... OH!
What's wrong, Maria?
...I will go.
Maria, what do you mean?
I have an idea... Leave it to me.
But how? With what attack...?

I am fine. I will definitely reach her. This
is something I must do alone.
Maria, hey... MARIA?!

(Maria dove into the maelstrom of energy,
letting her Astral Dress absorb the damage.)
Forward... Must push forward...! Ngh!
Maria?!
Yoshino! Kotori!!
Shido-san! You're safe...!
Oh, looks like we're just in time.
Yoshino, Kotori! I'm glad you're all right.

Of course we are. How about you guys? For
now, it seems like the Fraxinus's cannon is
taken care of.

Yeah, but now it's about to fall right into
Tengu City.

That's an even worse situation! Guess we'll
have to do something about that.

(Kotori pointed at the raging black mass as
she spoke.)
That thing is outta control! We can't get\nclose in these conditions!

Maria dove in there, just now. Thankfully
you two came to back me up.
Maria dove in... Why?
She said there's something she has to do.

Can you hear me, Shido? Soon, I will be
able to connect with Marina.
Maria's voice...? A communication...

In actuality, there is one sure method that
would erase Marina.
What...?

If I connect with Marina—using the data that
I had accumulated in this world—sharing this
with her will cause an overflow.
An overflow...? Then what would happen?

Marina and I will disappear, putting an end
to the world's collapse.

Does that mean both of you will disappear?
No, you absolutely can't!

This is the best chance we have. For
everyone—for you—to live.
If it's for my sake, then don't sacrifice yourself!

Shido, I apologize for being selfish in this
moment, after all the times you protected me.
But to me, you are the most impo—
Maria! Hey, Maria!
...Maria's right.

Kotori, you too?! There has to be a way to
save both of them! I won't give up!

That black mass... If we can't get through
to the Astral Dress, then we can't stop the
Artificial Spirit.

If Maria touches the Astral Dress, she can
disrupt the energy field. She and only she
can do it.

But that's not the best method. Neither Maria
nor Marina can disappear!

It's not like I want Maria to disappear either!
But we don't have time! We can't deliberate
over this!
Hmm. We merely need to destroy that, right?
Tohka, Origami! You're safe.
There's no problem. We will attack the target.

It is quite large, so it will be difficult if we
do not focus on a single point. Miku-san,
will you assist me?

Yes, of course～. With my Gabriel, our timing
will be pitch perfect!

Heh heh. A total simultaneous attack. For the
Yamai Sisters, it'll be effortless. Child's play.

Agreement. We have mastered the art of
attacking in sync.
Kaguya and Yuzuru!!

Kotori-san, I'll... do my best too! So, please,
for Maria-san...

Ahh, man! I said I wanted to save her too,
didn't I? At this point, it's an all-out battle!

Miku, please adjust your timing! Kaguya and
Yuzuru will attack first. Everyone will follow!
Shido, strike her once the Astral Dress recovers!
Yeah, got it! I'm counting on you, everyone!

Let's start already. Here we go! 3, 2, 1...
Miku!
Leave it to me～. Gabriel, March!!
Activation. Raphael!
...El Kanaph!
Target confirmed. Calibrating aim... Attacking.

Kihihihi... The target is too big for missing
to be possible. ZAFKIEEEEEEL!!
Maria-san, please hang in there...! Zadkiel...!!

Shido, I'll leave the rest to you! Camael...
Megiddo!

Shido, we believe in you! Sandalphon,
Halvanhelev!!
Everyone, thank you. With this...!!
GOOOOOOOOOO!!

All right! With this! Now run, Shido!!
You must go, so hurry!
Right. Wait for me, Maria!
